title: Spectral Biclustering Algorithm
description: In this lab, we will use the Spectral Biclustering algorithm to cluster data by simultaneously considering both the rows (samples) and columns (features) of a matrix. It aims to identify patterns not only between samples but also within subsets of samples, allowing for the detection of localized structure within the data. This makes spectral biclustering particularly well-suited for datasets where the order or arrangement of features is fixed, such as in images, time series, or genomes. We will use the scikit-learn library to generate checkerboard dataset and bicluster it using the Spectral Biclustering algorithm.

meta.title: Spectral Biclustering Algorithm: Unveiling Hidden Patterns in Data
meta.description: Explore the power of Spectral Biclustering to uncover localized structure within complex datasets, perfect for image, time series, and genome analysis.
meta.keywords: machine learning, data clustering, spectral biclustering, scikit-learn, pattern recognition, data analysis, scikit-learn playground

i18n.title: 谱双聚类算法
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将使用谱双聚类算法，通过同时考虑矩阵的行（样本）和列（特征）来对数据进行聚类。其目的不仅是识别样本之间的模式，还包括样本子集内部的模式，从而能够检测数据中的局部结构。这使得谱双聚类特别适用于特征顺序或排列固定的数据集，如图像、时间序列或基因组。我们将使用scikit-learn库生成棋盘格数据集，并使用谱双聚类算法对其进行双聚类。

meta.title: 谱双聚类算法：揭示数据中的隐藏模式
meta.description: 探索谱双聚类的强大功能，以发现复杂数据集中的局部结构，非常适合图像、时间序列和基因组分析。
meta.keywords: 机器学习, 数据聚类, 谱双聚类, scikit-learn, 模式识别, 数据分析, scikit-learn游乐场
